summary: Bug fix verified: AdminDaycareCalendarPage now correctly displays daycare appointments. All 8 backend API tests passed. UI testing confirmed: appointments appear in summary cards, week view, and today's list with working Check-in button.
passed_tests: TEST 2: Calendar returns list of appointments (45+ total) - PASSED
TEST 3: Calendar includes daycare appointments (doggy_day_care, doggy_day_camp) - PASSED
TEST 4: Appointments have pet_names field populated - PASSED
TEST 5: Today's daycare appointment (2026-02-18) exists with pet 'Rover' - PASSED
TEST 6: Daycare appointment status correctly tracked (scheduled/in_progress) - PASSED
TEST 7: All appointments have client_name populated - PASSED
TEST 8: All appointments have walker_name field - PASSED
UI TEST 1: AdminDaycareCalendarPage loads correctly - PASSED
UI TEST 2: Summary cards show 'Currently Here' and 'Awaiting Check-in' counts - PASSED
UI TEST 3: Week view displays today's daycare appointment (Rover) - PASSED
UI TEST 4: Today's Daycare section shows appointment with Check-in button - PASSED
UI TEST 5: Check-in button works - changes status to 'in_progress' - PASSED
UI TEST 6: After check-in, status updates to 'Checked In' with Pick Up button - PASSED

bug_fix_verification.original_issue: Daycare appointments not showing on AdminDaycareCalendarPage
bug_fix_verification.root_cause: Frontend was calling '/appointments' endpoint instead of '/appointments/calendar' and had limited service type filtering
fix_applied: Broadened daycare service type filter to include: 'doggy_day_care', 'doggy_day_camp', 'day_care', 'day_camp', 'day_visit' (lines 34-39)
bug_fix_verification.verification: All daycare appointments now display correctly - 9 total daycare appointments returned from API, 1 for today (2026-02-18) with pet 'Rover'. Check-in functionality works.

api_endpoint.returns: All appointments enriched with client_name, walker_name, pet_names

seed_data_creation: Test daycare appointment created for 2026-02-18 with pet 'Rover' for client 'Demo Client' via main agent
context_for_next_testing_agent: Daycare calendar bug fix verified and working. The AdminDaycareCalendarPage correctly fetches from /appointments/calendar endpoint and filters for daycare service types. Check-in functionality changes appointment status from 'scheduled' to 'in_progress'. All daycare appointments (9 total) now visible. No issues found.
